summary: This is a brief email from August 16, 2019, requesting Ms. Noel's home phone number so a Duty Officer can conduct a wellness check on her over the weekend. It suggests official monitoring or concern for an individual's welfare shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Ms. Noel
persons.context: The email requests her home phone number so a Duty Officer can conduct a wellness check on her over the weekend.

events.title: Request for wellness check on Ms. Noel
events.description: An email is sent requesting Ms. Noel's home phone number so a Duty Officer can conduct a wellness check on her over the upcoming weekend.

keyFacts: On August 16, 2019, an email was sent requesting contact information for Ms. Noel to arrange a wellness check.
The request indicates official concern for Ms. Noel's welfare, with a Duty Officer tasked to perform the check.
The timing is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019, suggesting possible related monitoring of individuals.
